tasks.title: Transfer Code to New Expo Go Account
tasks.description: Transfer the existing app code to the shared Expo Go account that both you and the developer will use.

tasks.title: Adjust Baby Data and Loan Data in App
tasks.description: Ensure Baby QR scans properly update the financial statements. Also, allow users to manually enter loan data.

tasks.title: Loan Functionality
tasks.description: Implement loan feature without needing QR codes; allow input of loan amount and reason.

tasks.title: Fix Profession Loading from QR
tasks.description: Ensure that professions are loaded correctly from QR codes and reflected properly in the financial data.

tasks.title: Canva Presentation Collaboration
tasks.description: Assist with building the Milestone 1 interim presentation, focusing on the app’s development process.

tasks.title: App Testing and Troubleshooting
tasks.description: Test new features and report bugs. Focus on verifying baby and loan data integration.

tasks.title: Submit Your Dream Goals
tasks.description: Provide detailed info for your dream car, house, and ultimate goal — including estimated costs.

tasks.title: 3D Game Piece
tasks.description: Design or find a 3D model for your player piece. You can use Thingiverse or create your own.
